summary: After consuming liquor, four friends decide to do something interesting and visit a haunted bungalow. However, they do not realize that they have returned home with an evil spirit.
cast: Arulnithi|Ramesh Thilak|Sananth Reddy|M.S. Bhaskar|Jangiri Madhumitha|Yogi Babu|Inigo|Arun Pandian|Singampuli|Ram Vaitheeswaran|Abishek Joseph George
title: Demonte Colony
